org.apache.logging.log4j.core.async

接口 BlockingQueueFactory<E>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ArrayBlockingQueueFactory, DisruptorBlockingQueueFactory, JCToolsBlockingQueueFactory, LinkedTransferQueueFactory

    public interface BlockingQueueFactory<E>
    Factory for creating instances of BlockingQueue.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.7

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String ELEMENT_TYPE
      The element type to use for plugins implementing this interface.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      BlockingQueue<E> create(int capacity)
      Creates a new BlockingQueue with the specified maximum capacity.

    • 字段详细资料

      • ELEMENT_TYPE

        static final String ELEMENT_TYPE
        The element type to use for plugins implementing this interface.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        BlockingQueue<E> create(int capacity)
        Creates a new BlockingQueue with the specified maximum capacity. Note that not all implementations of BlockingQueue support a bounded capacity in which case the value is ignored.
        参数:
        capacity - maximum size of the queue if supported
        返回:
        a new BlockingQueue
